official_title: A resolution to authorize Robert  Hamm, former Senate employee, to appear as a witness before the Grand Jury, United States District Court for the District of Nashville, Tennessee.

summary.text: Authorizes Robert Hamm, former Senate employee, to appear as a witness before the Grand Jury, United States District Court for the District of Nashville, Tennessee.
